Row.Text: Your soldiers stand at attention, King Jax, fearsome ruler of the land and ruthless strategist. Your people delight in the unruly chaos you bring, while your enemies run and hide from the same chaos that stamps their ambitions into dust. Your beginnings here were humble, but soon after arriving in this realm, the trees were cleared to make way for your plans. Industry flourished, your people were granted a lavish lifestyle, and your military only kept growing.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This populace has become a passionate clan, with countless tools of destruction built but with no time or place to use them. They are eager to assist you in your misdeeds, for with your triumphs they will reap rewards at a magnitude unheard of to their predecessors.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Remarkable King, your people hunger for glory, for war. They desire for their borders to extend past the horizon. They yearn for a brilliant commander to lead them to victory. Will you answer their call? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?

(Jax): I came up with this name after thinking for a while... What would be the most pompous, self-aggrandizing name for a civilization I could think of? Something that'd really piss off Ragatha? Well, here you go. Welcome to The House of Jax.

(Jax): Well, if you really want to know the in's and out's about how I got here, go ask someone who cares to repeat it. I'm sure Pomni's got the time to write about it in her history books, but I don't - I've got cities to crush.

(Jax): I'd describe myself as a powderkeg. Capable of remaining completely inert and stoic, despite holding onto the potential for a lot of destructive power. Going insane with chaos isn't my thing, I'm not a nutso. I am strategic with when I let my gunpowder light up in flames.
Almighty King of The House of Jax
+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Merchant Specialists, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Engineer Specialists. Manufactories provide +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
The shotgunner excels in survivability. The unit heals 20HP after kills, unlike the Rifleman it replaces. May only be built by the House of Jax.
Pilfered from the Candy Canyon Kingdom, the design of this shotgun is rudimentary but effective.
The Shotgunner is the Jaxian unique unit, replacing the Riflemen. It possesses a promotion that provides +20HP after killing a non-barbarian enemy.
Provides +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and grants +10 XP to Land Units created in this city. Requires no [ICON_GOLD] Gold maintenance.

Upon being presented with the idea to build a Zoo in the empire by his advisors, Jax shuddered at the thought of seeing wholesome animals in his cities. During his time at the Digital Circus, Jax had made clear he believes all things cute and peaceful to be... completely boring. And so, Jax commissions a series of Boxing Rings across the empire to test the mettle of his military and provide entertainment at the same time.
Shotgunner heals 20 Damage when it kills a non-barbarian unit. Their weapon uses candies as ammunition, which doubles as a sugary & refreshing snack.
